name: Spyros C. Kontogiannis
content: Home Page of Spyros Kontogiannis @ CSE.UOI (obsolete)... New working environment After almost 20 fruitful and really enjoyable years at the Computer Science & Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina, since September 2022 I have moved to the Computer Engineering & Informatics Department of the University of Patras. In a few seconds you will be redirected to my new home page.
